title: Deadly Asian floods are no fluke. They’re a climate warning, scientists say
description: Scientists say the devastation reflects a warming global climate.
content:
By ANIRUDDHA GHOSAL and ANTON L. DELGADO
HANOI, Vietnam (AP) Southeast Asia is being pummeled by unusually severe floods this year, as late-arriving storms and relentless rains wreak havoc that has … [+6439 chars]
